SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.commongoal

Class CommonGoal

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.model.commongoal.CommonGoal
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConsecutiveTilesPatternGoal, DiagonalEqualPattern, EightShapelessPatternGoal, FourCornersPatternGoal, MinEqualsTilesPattern, StairPatternGoal, TilesInPositionsPatternGoal
public abstract class CommonGoal extends Card
This class is used to represent the common goal cards that are split between the active Players in the lobby, when the Game is created. Every goal is represented through its type, image and number of pattern repetitions necessary to achieve it. It contains a series of getters/setters to retrieve the different values associated to the common goal's card.
See Also:

  • Player

  • Constructor Details

    • CommonGoal

      public CommonGoal()
      Class constructor without parameters. Builds a CommonGoal with no type, ID, ...

    • CommonGoal

      public CommonGoal(int id, int numberOfPatternRepetitionsRequired, CheckType type)
      Class constructor with parameters. Builds a CommonGoal with a specific type, ID, ...
      Parameters:
      id - the identifier of the commonGoal imagine assigned to the card.
      numberOfPatternRepetitionsRequired - contains the number of times the personal goal must be completed to take the score tile.
      type - the type of check that has to be done on the considered common goal's card.

    • CommonGoal

      public CommonGoal(int id, int numberOfPatternRepetitionsRequired, CheckType type, List<ScoreTile> scoreTiles)
      Class constructor with parameters. Builds a CommonGoal with specific type, ID ... (numberOfPlayers and commonGoalID are also considered).
      Parameters:
      id - the identifier of the commonGoal imagine assigned to the card.
      numberOfPatternRepetitionsRequired - contains the number of times the personal goal must be completed to take the score tile.
      type - the type of check that has to be done on the considered common goal's card.
      scoreTiles - score tiles of the common goal

    • CommonGoal

      public CommonGoal(int id, int numberOfPatternRepetitionsRequired, CheckType type, int numberOfPlayers)
      Class constructor with parameters. Builds a CommonGoal with specific type, ID ... (numberOfPlayers and commonGoalID are also considered).
      Parameters:
      id - the identifier of the commonGoal imagine assigned to the card.
      numberOfPatternRepetitionsRequired - contains the number of times the personal goal must be completed to take the score tile.
      type - the type of check that has to be done on the considered common goal's card.
      numberOfPlayers - number of the players in the game, used for the scoreTiles.
